Good Question. Most likely in Q2 2018

Issue: When creating a custom module that is a global group and you have field groups inside that module that are check to be repeatable, you cannot add a second item of that group when "editing global group"
<@U2H3TT8F2> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U2H3TT8F2/F9L7S82F5/pasted_image_at_2018_03_07_04_04_pm.png|Pasted image at 2018-03-07, 4:04 PM>

you add a second field or do you mean you can’t have multiple instances of that repeatable group?

I think if it’s the second one the “edit global content” button will answer your questions
I made my group repeatable and it wont let me create any new ones when editing the global group. No worries, I think it was just as confusing typing it out
lol some HS dev is like - ” I don’t want to admit I broke that, just gonna fix that and pretend it didn’t happen”
I am curious how many of them look at this slack and either roll their eyes or are like "hot dam thats a good idea"

I think about half the things I say on here they’re either like “ugh….” or “hmm, good idea, pain in the butt to implement though”.

There’s probably a pin board at their office with our slack avatars and names  and big letters above it saying “Just remember - job security”
